It cannot operate on its own, yet it will provide fire support, assaulting whatever its conjurer casts at with magical missiles that never miss. ---- “I'm your only friend
I'm not your only friend
But I'm a little glowing friend
But really I'm not actually your friend
But I am”
-They Might Be Giants, “Birdhouse in Your Soul”. 1989.}} ==Useful Info== '''Battlespheres''' are globes of energy which can be created by the level 5 spell, [[Iskenderun's Battlesphere]], or the [[unrand]] [[sphere of Battle]]. They don't have any melee attacks, but each time you cast a [[destructive spell]] at a monster, they will shoot a barrage of energy at a random target. The power of the beam depends on the [[spellpower]] (for the spell) or your skill in [[Conjurations]] (for the sphere of Battle). You can fire through your own battlesphere. However, your battlesphere cannot fire through you. Being a conjured monster, battlespheres cannot be ordered around via the [[t]] command. ==History== *Battlespheres were added in [[0.12]]. For more history, see [[Iskenderun's Battlesphere#History|Iskenderun's Battlesphere]].
